name: Stole The Heart
description:
Game Design Document

Info:

In 2022, a college student named Rachel accidentally fell asleep while playing a video game and woke up to find herself in the middle of a medieval game she had just played.

The main content of this game is that the evil Lord appears in hell and leads the Warcraft to wreak havoc in the town,

So the king sent out a proclamation saying that the one who could get the demon King's destiny spell would have the right to inherit the kingdom.

She decided to complete the main quest so she could return to the real world.

This is where our story begins...

Mechanics and Controls:
  • WASD stick to move
  • Mouse/Right stick to attack enemy
  • Space stick to stop the cursor
